name: queryFilter
syntax: queryFilter(query, function(row [, currentRow] [, query] ){} [, parallel] [, maxThreads])
description: Filters query rows specified in filter criteria

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration. Returns true if the row should be included in the filtered query.

callback_params.name: row
callback_params.description: A struct with all of the columns for the current iteration

callback_params.name: currentRow
callback_params.description: The row number for the current iteration

callback_params.name: query
callback_params.description: A reference of the original query

params.name: parallel
params.description: Lucee4.5+ CF2021+ true if the items can be executed in parallel

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Lucee4.5+ CF2021+ the maximum number of threads to use when parallel = true

coldfusion.notes: queryFilter mutated the original query in CF2016 and 2018 (bug report: https://tracker.adobe.com/#/view/CF-4203366)
